title: Light&Quiet 2 bed with full size washer/dryer 11/1
posting_body: This is an immaculate 2 bed apartment in a 3 family all professional building.
Hardwood floors shine through out this apartment.
Included is a full size washer and dryer only 3 years old.
Tilt in windows for easy washing.
Large living room.
2 equal size bedrooms.
Updated bathroom.
It is plain beautiful.
Located one house off Cypress Street.
10 min walk to the Greenline stop Brookline Hills T station.
You are a 10 minute walk from Olmstead Park and Willow Pond Meadow.
Available November 1st.
There are no utilities included with the rent.
The heat is gas.
The tenant is responsible for heat and hot water and electric and cable.
No satellite dishes will be attached to this building.
Requirements are a good credit score (700+) currently employed or in a doctoral program.
Great references.
Required will be 1st month rent, last months rent, security deposit and 1/2 fee.
The rent is $2500 firm.
PROFESSIONALS ONLY.
NO UNDERGRADS.
Tenant finds their own parking.
Several rentals nearby.
